newsitem.title: USA: Amcore sells $40 mln in securities.
newsitem.headline: Amcore sells $40 mln in securities.

text.p: Amcore Financial Inc said Wednesday it completed a $40 million private placement of 9.35 percent capital securities.

The securities were issued by Amcore's recently formed unit, Amcore Capital Trust and proceeds were invested by the Trust in junior subordinated debentures of Amcore. The net proceeds from the sale of the debentures will be used to repay in full the parent company long term debt, to repay in full at closing the long term borrowings of pending acquisitions, and general corporate purposes, Amcore said.
Amcore shares were down 1/2 at 27-1/4 Wednesday.
